section.simpara: Deletes a family or branch from the Asterisk database.
Deletes the specified branch from the Asterisk database.
section.programlisting: ; save entries in AstDB: exten => 123,1,Set(DB(colors/one)=red) exten => 123,n,Set(DB(colors/two)=blue) ; now delete the key family named test exten => 123,n,DBdeltree(colors)

formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'DBdeltree' =-
[Synopsis] Delete a family or keytree from the database
[Description] DBdeltree(family[/keytree]): This application will delete a family or keytree from the Asterisk database
